
public class Fb {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
        Scanner s = new Scanner(System.in);
        Solution sl = new Solution();
		int a = s.nextInt();
        int fib = sl.fibonacci(a);
        
		s.close();
      
	}

}
class Solution{
	int sum = 0;
	int a1 = 0;
	int a2 = 1;
	public int fibonacci(int n){
		if(n == 1){
			return a1;
		}else if(n == 2){
			return a2;
		}else{
			for(int i = 3;i <= n;i++){
				sum = a1 + a2;
				a1 = a2;
				a2 = sum;
			}
			return sum;
		}
	}
}
